div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: FOOD SERVICE ROUTES REGISTRATION (UPDATED 04/23/20) Help us Help You. We need our families to register to pick up meals. This provides us better information to help us prepare for the numbers...
March 28, 2020 RE: USD 234 COVID-19 District Update KS Statewide Stay-at-Home Order: Today, Kansas Governor, Laura Kelly, issued Statewide Stay-at-Home Order which goes into effect at 12:01 AM...

March 28, 2020 – COVID-19 Food Service Update for the Week of March 30thUSD 234 Fort Scott will be doing two distributions the week of March 30th. On Monday, March 30th, the child will be receiving...

Food Service Route Registration: Please go to the following link to register for meals for the week of April 27. Registration allows our Food Service staff to prepare enough meals to be served. Thank you.
Census 2020: Fort Scott Tigers make sure that our district gets the funding we need by completing the 2020 Census. Visit 2020Census.gov to complete the Census online or call (844) 330-2020.
USD 234 Fort Scott will be doing three (3) distributions the week of April 20th.

On Monday, April 20th, the child will be receiving a total of 2 meals per child. On Tuesday, April 21st, the child will be receiving a total of 4 meals per child. On Wednesday, April 22nd, the child will be receiving a total of 4 meals per child. Children will receive the same amount of meals for the week but will pick them up over 3 days. Bus routes drop-offs will remain the same. School sites will remain the same – the high school and Eugene Ware.
Parents/Guardians wanting to receive meals for their children should register at www.usd234.org and complete the form for each day. Help us help you. It is a short form but helps us prepare for the number of meals each day. Please call 620-223-0800 if you need help or have questions and Kerrie Wilson will assist you.
USD 234 Meal Distribution - Please register for meals for the week of April 20th by going to the following link http://fortscottks.apptegy.us/article/229164?org=usd-234

FORT SCOTT USD 234
424 S. Main
Fort Scott, KS 66701
Phone: 620-223-0800
